changes: Inventory card q-ty 'target' feature (in popup card window), that allows to set fixed q-ty of card you want to have, or desired surplus in addition to calculated (from decks) required q-ty. When used for the card, this will replace +/- q-ty column in inventory info with this instead of decks-based calculation (square [brackets] will tell you if 'target' feature is used)
Add AND logic to crypt clan filter (allow Path + Clan), add No Path filter
Add Block Denial to library trait filter
